      offers distance sorting values from distanceValuesArray

      distance sorting values (location: res/values/strings)

      textview to hold friday opening time of displayed canteen, Canteen
      (package private) android.widget.Button getCanteenMenuButton
      method to call web browser to display canteen menu (using Canteen.getUrl())
      (package private) android.widget.Button getRouteButton
      method to call google maps to display route to canteen
      (package private) android.widget.ImageView goodMoodIcon
      funny icon which returns toast: GOOD FOOD = GOOD MOOD
      (package private) android.location.LocationManager locationManager
      location manager to check whether GPS location is enabled
      (package private) com.google.android.gms.location.FusedLocationProviderClient locationProvider
      service to get location of the user
      (package private) int[] minimalCapacityValues
      array to hold integer values of capacitySpinner
      (package private) int[] minimalRatingValues
      array to hold integer values of ratingSpinner
      (package private) android.widget.ImageView moveBackIcon
      icon which enables moving on the previous canteen during the browsing of canteens, when pressed reduce displayedCanteenNumber by one and calls updateSearchScene()
      (package private) android.widget.ImageView moveForwardIcon
      icon which enables moving on the next canteen during the browsing of canteens, when pressed increase displayedCanteenNumber by one and calls updateSearchScene()
      (package private) android.widget.TextView openingTime
      textview to hold opening time of displayed canteen (Monday - Thursday), Canteen
      (package private) android.widget.TextView rating
      textview to hold rating of displayed canteen, Canteen
      (package private) android.widget.Spinner ratingSpinner
      offers rating sorting values from ratingValuesArray
      (package private) android.widget.ArrayAdapter<java.lang.CharSequence> ratingValuesArray
      rating sorting values (location: res/values/strings)
      (package private) android.widget.Button resetButton
      button to reset all searching values to unimportant, does not effect sorting value
      (package private) android.widget.Button savePreferencesButton
      button to save user searching preferences into internal storage
      (package private) MainActivity.Scene scene
      holds already set scene MainActivity.Scene
      (package private) android.widget.Button searchButton
      search for canteens matching searching parameters, when pressed causes scene change from baseContent to searchContent if location permissions granted and isGPSEnabled(), isInternetAvailable() return true, in other case the dialog asking for permission, GPS enabling or Internet connection will be shown
      (package private) android.widget.LinearLayout searchContent
      layout to represent individual results of searching - searchScene, (visibility.GONE on start of application)
      (package private) android.widget.ImageView sortIcon
      icon which offers sorting possibilities when pressed, when is application in the search scene the canteens matching searching values suitableCanteens are sorted by sortSuitableCanteens(), displayedCanteenNumber is set to 0 and scene is updated updateSearchScene()
      (package private) MainActivity.Sorting sorting
      sorting enum MainActivity.Sorting
      (package private) android.widget.Spinner[] spinners
      array to hold spinners distanceSpinner, ratingSpinner, capacitySpinner
      (package private) java.util.List<Canteen> suitableCanteens
      array to hold canteens which satisfy searching parameters
      (package private) double userLatitude
      latitude of the user gained by using userLocation
      (package private) android.location.Location userLocation
      user location gained by using locationManager
      (package private) double userLongitude
      longitude of the user gained by using userLocation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addItemsToSpinners()
      method to add items to spinners spinners
      private boolean fileExists​(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String filename)
      check whether file already exist
      private void getUserLocation()
      method to get user location by using locationProvider, if last location of user is reasonably up to date the method useLastLocation() will be called otherwise the method useCurrentLocation() will be called
      private void initialization()
      initialization of all components: initializeImageViews(), initializeButtons(), initializeCanteenInfoPanels(), initializeCanteens(), initializeConnectivityManager(), initializeLocationManagerAndProvider(), initializeSpinners(), initializeSpinnerItems(), addItemsToSpinners(), loadUserPreferences(),
      private void initializeButtons()
      method to initialize all buttons
      private void initializeCanteenInfoPanels()
      Initialization of components which holds displayed canteen data
      private void initializeCanteens()
      initialize array of canteens Canteen using assets/canteens.txt
      private void initializeConnectivityManager()
      initialization of internet network service
      private void initializeImageViews()
      initialization of all icons
      private void initializeLocationManagerAndProvider()
      initialization of location service locationManager, locationProvider
      private void initializeSpinnerItems()
      method to initialize arrays which holds spinnerÂ´s values, arrays may be found in res/values/strings.xml
      private void initializeSpinners()
      method to initialize spinners spinners
      private boolean isGPSEnabled()
      method to check whether GPS is enabled
      private boolean isInternetAvailable()
      method to check whether internet connection is enabled
      private void loadUserPreferences()
      method to load user preferences for searching from internal storage, if file does not exist the file default_preferences.txt located in res/assets/default_preferences.txt is used
      private void measureDistances()
      method to measure distance between user and all canteens, inside loop calls Canteen.measureDistance(double, double) providing userLatitude and userLongitude gained by using userLocation
      protected void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      main method called when application starts
      private void requestGPSEnabling()
      alert dialog requesting GPS enabling
      private void requestInternetEnabling()
      alert dialog requesting internet connection
      private void setBaseScene()
      setting base scene baseContent
      private void setSearchScene()
      setting search scene which displays searching result, if no canteen match searching parameters the dialog informing about this fact will be shown
      private void showDialogLocalizationFailure()
      alert dialog informing that user localization failed
      private void showDialogLocalizationInProgress()
      alert dialog showing that user localization is in progress (displayed during use of useCurrentLocation())
      private void showDialogNoCanteenFound()
      alert dialog to inform user that no Canteen from canteens matches searching parameters
      private void sortSuitableCanteens()
      sort canteens matching searching parameters by value given in sorting which is set by using sortIcon
      private void updateSearchScene()
      updating information about canteen when new canteen is set to be displayed (moving between canteens is done by moveBackIcon, moveForwardIcon)
      private void useCurrentLocation()
      method to get current location of user provided by locationProvider, called by getUserLocation(), if it fails alert dialog showDialogLocalizationFailure() will be shown
      private void useLastLocation()
      method to get last known location of user provided by locationProvider, called by getUserLocation(), if it fails th method useCurrentLocation() is called

      • arrowBackIcon

        android.widget.ImageView arrowBackIcon

      • sortIcon

        android.widget.ImageView sortIcon
        icon which offers sorting possibilities when pressed, when is application in the search scene the canteens matching searching values suitableCanteens are sorted by sortSuitableCanteens(), displayedCanteenNumber is set to 0 and scene is updated updateSearchScene()

        funny icon which returns toast: GOOD FOOD = GOOD MOOD

        android.widget.ImageView moveBackIcon
        icon which enables moving on the previous canteen during the browsing of canteens, when pressed reduce displayedCanteenNumber by one and calls updateSearchScene()

      • moveForwardIcon

        android.widget.ImageView moveForwardIcon
        icon which enables moving on the next canteen during the browsing of canteens, when pressed increase displayedCanteenNumber by one and calls updateSearchScene()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        main method called when application starts
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - savedInstanceState

      • getUserLocation

        private void getUserLocation()
        method to get user location by using locationProvider, if last location of user is reasonably up to date the method useLastLocation() will be called otherwise the method useCurrentLocation() will be called

      • useLastLocation

        private void useLastLocation()
        method to get last known location of user provided by locationProvider, called by getUserLocation(), if it fails th method useCurrentLocation() is called

      • useCurrentLocation

        private void useCurrentLocation()
        method to get current location of user provided by locationProvider, called by getUserLocation(), if it fails alert dialog showDialogLocalizationFailure() will be shown

      • showDialogLocalizationInProgress

        private void showDialogLocalizationInProgress()
        alert dialog showing that user localization is in progress (displayed during use of useCurrentLocation())

      • showDialogLocalizationFailure

        private void showDialogLocalizationFailure()
        alert dialog informing that user localization failed

      • fileExists

                           java.lang.String filename)
        check whether file already exist
        Parameters:
        context - context
        filename - name of file
        Returns:
        boolean value whether file exists or not
